Let me transform this resume into a coherent story:

Meet a dynamic sales professional whose journey in the hospitality industry spans over six years. Starting with a General Business diploma from Ringgold High School in 2012, this individual has built a career marked by steady growth and dedication to customer service excellence.

Their professional journey began at Zaxby's in September 2014, where they mastered the fundamentals of customer service as a cashier. Here, they didn't just handle transactions – they created welcoming experiences, greeting customers with warmth while efficiently managing both cash and credit payments. Their natural ability to multitask and attention to detail quickly became apparent as they balanced various responsibilities, from maintaining a spotless workspace to organizing special events.

In January 2015, they took a significant step forward, assuming the role of Sales Manager. In this position, they demonstrated their leadership capabilities by overseeing both local and regional sales teams. Their responsibilities expanded to include staff training, performance evaluations, and developing comprehensive sales programs. They showed particular talent in building and maintaining client relationships, often going above and beyond by working additional hours with Live Support to ensure customer satisfaction.

Throughout their career, they've developed a robust skill set that includes conflict resolution, team management, and excellent verbal communication. Their experience with various point-of-sale systems and inventory management tools has made them particularly adept at leveraging technology to improve business operations.

What truly sets this professional apart is their passionate commitment to exceeding customer expectations. Whether it's resolving complex customer complaints, coordinating special events, or training new team members, they bring enthusiasm and professionalism to every task. Their ability to work efficiently in fast-paced environments while maintaining meticulous attention to detail makes them an invaluable asset to any sales team.

Currently, they continue to build upon their success, focusing on growing key customer relationships and developing innovative sales strategies while leading by example with their friendly and professional demeanor.
